channel.title: Req 614 beta testers unlimited shop tokens
channel.description:
some info...
a video here that makes life easy...
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzI_Sd952TI]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kzI_Sd952TI[/url]
heres a pic for preview
[img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6972/rspspic.png[/img]
REMEMBER I AM NOT ADVERTING
i am simply asking for a few beta testers to help me find bugs dupes glitches errors i made ect.
please if you have the time come take a test run it is of grace importance to me i know what other ppl think about it and love to hear the oppinions
client link (note you do need to know how to open the folder and run a batch file lol)
[url=http://uppit.com/ojuj7rpx06h5/Incarnation_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/ojuj7rpx06h5/Incarnation_Client.rar[/url]
EDIT: some features:full dice game perfect npc combat and player vs player combat currently not much content yet but it is coming very soon
